languages.text: {n}Навстречу вам идут люди в алых одеяниях {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Братства Марса{/g}. Взгляды их прикованы к Паскалю.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Дорогу вам заступают люди в алых одеяниях {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Братства Марса{/g}. Даже для Адептус Механикус подобное поведение выглядит несколько бесцеремонно.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A group dressed in the crimson of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} walks toward you. Their gazes are fixed on Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Навстречу вам идут люди в алых одеяниях {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Братства Марса{/g}. Взгляды их прикованы к Паскалю.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your path is blocked by people dressed in the scarlet of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Brotherhood of Mars{/g}. That behaviour is rather unceremonious even by Adeptus Mechanicus standards.{/n}

{n}Your path is blocked by people dressed in the scarlet of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Brotherhood of Mars{/g}. That behaviour is rather unceremonious even by Adeptus Mechanicus standards.{/n}

{n}Your path is blocked by people dressed in the scarlet of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Brotherhood of Mars{/g}. That behaviour is rather unceremonious even by Adeptus Mechanicus standards.{/n}

{n}Your path is blocked by people dressed in the scarlet of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Brotherhood of Mars{/g}. That behaviour is rather unceremonious even by Adeptus Mechanicus standards.{/n}
{n}A group dressed in the crimson of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} walks toward you. Their gazes are fixed on Pasqal.{/n}
{n}A group dressed in the crimson of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} walks toward you. Their gazes are fixed on Pasqal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}火星の神官団{/g}の真紅の服をまとった一団があなたへと近づいてくる。その眼差しは、パスカルに向けられていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group dressed in the crimson of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} walks toward you. Their gazes are fixed on Pasqal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}火星の神官団{/g}の真紅の服をまとった一団があなたへと近づいてくる。その眼差しは、パスカルに向けられていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}一群穿着{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}火星祭司{/g}深红色长袍的人向你走来，所有人的目光都死死地盯着帕斯卡。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group dressed in the crimson of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} walks toward you. Their gazes are fixed on Pasqal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}几个穿着{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}火星兄弟会{/g}猩红色长袍的人拦住了你的去路。即便是以机械修会的标准来看，这样的行为也相当无礼。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine im Rot der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesterschaft des Mars{/g} gewandete Gruppe kommt auf dich zu. Ihre Blicke ruhen auf Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group dressed in the crimson of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} walks toward you. Their gazes are fixed on Pasqal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dir wird der Weg von Leuten im Purpurrot der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Bruderschaft des Mars{/g} versperrt. Dieses Benehmen ist überaus dreist, selbst nach den Standards des Adeptus Mechanicus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un groupe d'individus vêtus de l'écarlate propre au {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Clergé de Mars{/g} s'avance vers vous en fixant Pasqal du regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group dressed in the crimson of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} walks toward you. Their gazes are fixed on Pasqal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un groupe d'individus vêtus de l'écarlate propre au {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Clergé de Mars{/g} s'avance vers vous en fixant Pasqal du regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Varias personas vestidas con las túnicas escarlata del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Sacerdocio de Marte{/g} caminan hacia ti. Sus miradas están fijas en Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group dressed in the crimson of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} walks toward you. Their gazes are fixed on Pasqal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Varias personas vestidas con las túnicas escarlata del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Sacerdocio de Marte{/g} se interponen en tu camino. Es una conducta muy poco ceremoniosa, incluso para las costumbres del Adeptus Mechanicus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Mars Rahipliği'nin{/g} kızıllarına bürünmüş bir grup, sana doğru yürüyor. Bakışlarını Pasqal'a kenetlenmiş durumdalar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group dressed in the crimson of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} walks toward you. Their gazes are fixed on Pasqal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Mars Rahipliği{/g}'nin kızıllarına bürünmüş bir grup sana doğru yürüyor. Bakışları Pasqal'a kenetlenmiş durumda.{/n}
